title: border-block
description: The `border-block` CSS property sets the width, style and color of the block-start and block-end borders of an element.
content: The property that sets the width, style and color of the border on the block-start and block-end sides of an element. This property is useful for controlling the border on vertical sides of a block-level element. For example, it can be used to add a border to the top and bottom of a block element.
